column5: This Bed & Breakfast has 6 bedrooms, each room accommodates 2 people per room. The price is $139 per room per night. This place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and big groups. If you have a group of up to 10-12 people, special price is $99 per room per night. 6% tax is charged for all reservations.
column8: Bed & Breakfast (The Retreat) at Canaan Land Ranch
